alert.note: Alert for North St. Louis (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 2:10PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Koochiching and northwestern St. Louis Counties through 245 PM CDT... At 210 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Pelland, to near Littlefork, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... International Falls around 225 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Kabetogama, Rainy Lake West, Rainy Lake East, Kabetogama Lake and Voyageurs National Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
